subject: Application for Data Scientist Position
body:
Hi
 I hope this message finds you well.

I am writing to express my interest in the Data Scientist position at Prime Infoserv. As a final-year B.Sc. Digital Forensics student with practical experience handling security operations for multiple clients, I believe I can make a valuable contribution to your team.

I have attached my resume and cover letter for your kind consideration. I would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss how my background, certifications.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Tirthabrata Mandal
